title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: The bug occurs when the value new Date('3/2/2005') is used in a table filter. An error message is thrown.
OB: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is being thrown.
EB: No error message should be thrown when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the 'value1' field of the filter, enter the value new Date('3/2/2005').
